Title: Dan & Danielle/James & David/Karli
Plot: A romantic walk turns into a nightmare for two young friends when a man forces them into his truck at gunpoint and shoots them both. A snowmobile outing ends in a near-death experience for two brothers when they plunge through the ice of a frozen river. A woman is brutally attacked twice by the same gang of hoodlums.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
